name: SUPER GLOBE DASH
description:
Earth is balancing between life and death... literally.

In SUPER GLOBE DASH, a local multiplayer, capture the flag type game, you play as either Angelica, the archangel, or Grim, the grim reaper. The goal is to hold Earth the longest throughout the game.

Controls:

Left analog stick: Move
A/X: Tackle
